title: Feature Request: Paste Commands
author: 1nv1n
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
Use-Case:
I'm looking for a way to have some saved commands to be automatically be pasted (after a set delay) onto an open SSH session. Something similar to the "Macros" concept that exists on MobaXterm.

eg: In a session, I would have to type in "Command A", followed by "Command B" & so on. If there could be a feature that automate this, it would be greatly appreciated.

Related Reddit thread: https://www.reddit.com/r/mRemoteNG/comments/5wxom0/q_paste_commands/
